summary: Simply makes Auriel's Bow from the Dawnguard DLC a bit thinner and less dumb.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

Simply makes Auriel's Bow from the Dawnguard DLC a bit thinner and less dumb. 


[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]

Copy the meshes folder to [i]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data[/i], or alternatively, install with NMM. 


[b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b]

This mod is not compatible with mesh edits, but it IS compatible with retextures.
author: Billyro
